definitions.definition: Any formal system of reasoning that arrives at a truth by the exchange of logical arguments .
A contradiction of ideas that serves as the determining factor in their interaction .
examples: This situation created the inner dialectic of American history.

definitions.definition: development by way of overcoming internal contradictions

main_definition: Any formal system of reasoning that arrives at a truth by the exchange of logical arguments .
secondary_definitions: A contradiction of ideas that serves as the determining factor in their interaction .
( Hegelianism , Marxism ) development by way of overcoming internal contradictions
